name: trello
title: Trello
description: Update cards, add comments, create new cards, and read board members from your chatbot.

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: Unique identifier of the Trello user

addMemberToCard.title: Member added to card
addMemberToCard.description: Triggered when a member is added to a card

member.description: Member that was added to the card

id.description: Unique identifier of the previous list

checklist.description: Checklist where the item was updated

id.description: Unique identifier of the check item

id.description: Unique identifier of the comment that was deleted

label.description: Label that was removed from the card

updateCheckItem.description: Triggered when a check item is modified in a checklist of a card

checklist.description: Checklist where the item was updated

id.description: Unique identifier of the check item

name.description: Old name of the check item

state.description: Old state of the check item

updateComment.description: Triggered when a comment is updated

id.description: Unique identifier of the comment that was updated

voteOnCard.title: Vote on card
voteOnCard.description: Triggered when a vote is added to a card

voted.description: Whether the user voted on the card

Output schema for getting a board from its name

newCommentId.description: Unique identifier of the newly created comment

updateCard.title: Update card
updateCard.description: Update the details of a card

schema.description: Input schema for creating a new card

closedState.description: Whether the card should be archived (Optional). Enter "open", "archived" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.

completeState.description: Whether the card should be marked as complete (Optional). Enter "complete", "incomplete" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.

schema.description: Output schema for updating a card
